name: Ivona Tau X Johnnie Walker Ghost & Rare

metadata.name: Ivona Tau x Johnnie Walker Ghost & Rare
metadata.description:
This artwork is inspired by the vital element and ingredient of the rare liquids - water. Its flow can show both extreme force and mystery. Water takes on many different forms that change its meaning without changing the essential structure. In this work, the artist combines multiple AI models to find and illuminate hidden representations of the water flow. 

It is achieved by combining with other transformative forms such as smoke and reflections. Using AI allows the creation of non-apparent intersections and fluid transformations between different concepts.

The work is one of the first attempts to train the GAN model on contemporary text-to-image model outputs. By combining different approaches, new variations are created through the multi-step procedure, and interpolation is made possible. The artist used a custom AI model that has been learning from her photography for more than a year and finetuned it on a collection of a few hundred AI-generated (text-to-image) images, curated by the artist for style coherence.
